availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William A. Brevard (Hickman, Kentucky, circuit court clerk)

body.p: Hickman, Kentucky, court clerk. Tennessee native. Married to Mary S. Warner Brevard in Shelby County, Tennessee, on December 23, 1858. Clerk of the Fulton Circuit Court from 1863 to 1867.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton County, Hickman, p. 92.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton County, Hickman, p. 22.
Tennessee, Compiled Marriages, 1851-1900, Shelby County, 1858 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
William T. Samuels, Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1865 (Frankfort, KY: George D. Prentice, 1866), p. 11.
William T. Samuels, Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1867 (Frankfort, KY: John H. Harney, 1867), p. 355.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Film # 994027-994058: Fulton County Deaths, 1878 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
